sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-form v-model="isValid" @submit.prevent="submit">
    <v-text-field
        v-model="email"
        v-validate="'required|email'"
        :autofocus="autofocus"
        color="dark"
        type="email"
        label="E-mail address"
        placeholder=" "
        data-vv-validate-on="blur"
        data-vv-name="email"
        :error-messages="errors.collect('email')"
    />

    {{ error }}

    <v-btn type="submit" :color="statusProps.color" :dark="statusProps.dark" block>
      {{ statusProps.submitTitle }}
    </v-btn>
  </v-form>
</template>

<script>
  const statusses = {
    idle: { submitTitle: 'Send reset e-mail', color: 'secondary', dark: true },
    submitting: { submitTitle: 'Sending the reset e-mail...', color: 'default' },
    success: { submitTitle: 'Finished! Please check your e-mail.', color: 'success' },
    error: { submitTitle: 'Oops! Something went wrong...', color: 'error', dark: true },
  };

  export default {
    props: {
      error: { type: String, default: '' },
      autofocus: { type: Boolean, default: false },
      status: { type: String, default: 'idle' },
    },
    data() {
      return {
        isValid: false,
        email: '',
      };
    },

    computed: {
      statusProps() {
        return statusses[this.status];
      },
    },

    methods: {
      async submit() {
        await this.$validator.validateAll();

        const { email } = this;

        if (!this.isValid) {
          return;
        }

        this.$emit('submit', { email });
      },
    },
  };
</script>


<style>
  input:-webkit-autofill,
  input:-webkit-autofill:hover,
  input:-webkit-autofill:focus,
  textarea:-webkit-autofill,
  textarea:-webkit-autofill:hover,
  textarea:-webkit-autofill:focus,
  select:-webkit-autofill,
  select:-webkit-autofill:hover,
  select:-webkit-autofill:focus {
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 1000px #ffffff inset;
    transition: background-color 5000s ease-in-out 0s;
  }
</style>
